meta.title: About EduPro | Transforming Professional Training in Africa
meta.description: We believe in African genius. EduPro was born from a simple conviction: Africa has the talents, it just needs the right tools to reveal them. Since 2023, we've been building the platform that transforms this vision into reality, one skill at a time.
meta.keywords: about EduPro, African education, professional training platform, skills development, Africa, mission, vision

hero.title: We believe in African genius
hero.subtitle: EduPro was born from a simple conviction: Africa has the talents, it just needs the right tools to reveal them. Since 2023, we've been building the platform that transforms this vision into reality, one skill at a time.

mission.title: Our mission: Accelerate skills transformation in Africa

observation.title: The Observation
observation.text: Every year, millions of African professionals see their potential unexploited. Not for lack of talent or ambition, but for lack of access to quality continuous training. International solutions? Too expensive, too far from our realities. Local solutions? Often limited in scope and impact.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.intro: We create a platform that addresses three major challenges:

accessibility.label: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Quality training at affordable prices, optimized for mobile and low bandwidth

interactivity.label: Interactivity
interactivity.description: Engaging learning experiences that promote retention and practical application

measurability.label: Measurability
measurability.description: Precise tracking of progress and real impact on professional performance

ecosystem.title: The Ecosystem
ecosystem.text: We don't just create a platform. We build an ecosystem where companies, trainers, learners and investors collaborate to raise the skill level of the continent. Each actor finds their value, each interaction creates impact. Because when Africa excels, the whole world benefits.

quote.text: I grew up seeing extraordinary talents limited by lack of training opportunities. EduPro is my answer to this injustice. We don't seek to copy what exists elsewhere - we create what should exist here.
quote.author: â€” Founder, CEO & Co-founder EduPro

vision.title: Our vision: Build the next generation of African talents
vision.main: Build the next generation of African talents through digitalization of professional training and equitable access to knowledge.
vision.description: Africa is full of exceptional talents. Our vision is to give them digital tools to develop their skills, regardless of their geographic location or economic situation.

future.title: We believe in a future where:

items.professional: Every African professional has access to the same training opportunities as their international peers
items.digitalization: Digitalization eliminates geographic and financial barriers
items.knowledge: Knowledge flows freely across the continent
items.talents: African talents are recognized and valued at their fair value on the world stage

vision.ambition: Our ambition: Become the pan-African reference in digital professional training, reaching millions of learners in the next 10 years.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.subtitle: Break down all barriers
features: Prices adapted to local realities (up to 70% cheaper)
Mobile-first: 78% of our traffic is mobile
Native offline mode for low connectivity areas
Multilingual (FR, EN, + local languages in phase 2)
Local payments (Mobile Money, FCFA, Shilling)
accessibility.commitment: No talent should be limited by their geography or economic situation.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.subtitle: Every voice counts, every talent has its place
features: Content created by African experts for Africa
Fair representation of genders and regions
Pathways adapted to all levels (beginner to expert)
Intuitive and accessible interface on all devices
Inclusive and caring community for all learners
inclusion.commitment: We celebrate African diversity as our greatest wealth.

contextualization.title: Contextualization
contextualization.subtitle: Solutions designed for our realities
features: Use cases based on real African companies
Trainers who understand local context
Integration of regulatory specificities of each country
Examples and exercises rooted in African reality
Partnerships with leading local companies
contextualization.commitment: International quality, local relevance. The best of both worlds.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.subtitle: Build for future generations
features: Balanced and profitable economic model
Fair remuneration of African trainers
Measurable and transparent social impact
Development of critical skills for the future
Partnerships with actors committed to development
sustainability.commitment: We're not building a startup. We're building an institution.

values.title: The values that unite us
values.subtitle: Our values are not words on a wall. They are the principles that guide each of our decisions, from our internal culture to our interactions with our clients.

excellence.title: African Excellence
excellence.subtitle: We aim for world excellence, anchored in Africa
excellence.description: We refuse compromise on quality. Every training, every feature, every interaction must be at the level of the best international standards, while being deeply relevant to the African context.

impact.title: Impact Before Profit
impact.subtitle: Our success is measured in transformed lives
impact.description: We build a sustainable economic model, but never at the expense of our mission. Every decision is evaluated first on its impact on learners, trainers, and African companies.
practices: Affordable prices designed for African context
Partnerships with organizations to facilitate access to training
Total transparency on our vision and impact objectives
Priority reinvestment in R&D and platform improvement

userOriented.title: User Orientation
userOriented.subtitle: Every decision starts with the learner
userOriented.description: We design every feature, every content, every interaction thinking first about our users' experience: learners, trainers and companies. Their success is our only compass.
practices: Regular user testing before each launch
Feedback continuously integrated into our development cycles
Interface designed for African context (mobile-first, low bandwidth)

agility.title: Agility and Innovation
agility.subtitle: Status quo is not an option
agility.description: Africa evolves rapidly, and so do we. We test, iterate, learn, and improve constantly. Smart failure is encouraged, stagnation is unacceptable.
practices: Rapid adoption of relevant new technologies

join.title: Want to be part of the story?
join.subtitle: EduPro is not just a company. It's a movement to transform professional education in Africa. And we're looking for passionate people to join us.

careers.title: Career Opportunities
careers.subtitle: Build with us the platform of tomorrow
careers.description: Joining EduPro means participating in the transformation of professional training in Africa. We're looking for passionate talents who share our vision and want to have a measurable impact.
benefits: Inspiring mission with direct social impact
careers.note: We regularly recruit in development, design, pedagogy, business development and customer support.

trainer.title: Become Partner Trainer
trainer.subtitle: Share your expertise, reach thousands of learners
trainer.description: You're an expert in your field and want to have impact at scale?
benefits: AI tools to create your training 40% faster
Pan-African visibility to thousands of learners
trainer.note: Fields sought: Tech, Business, Leadership, Construction, Health, Agriculture

partner.title: Become Partner
partner.subtitle: Let's build tomorrow's ecosystem together
partner.description: We're open to strategic partnerships with:
benefits: Companies - Custom training for your teams

contact.subtitle: We respond to all your messages (promise!)

hero.subtitle: A question, a project, a collaboration? Our team is here to help you.

finalCta.title: Ready to transform Africa?
finalCta.subtitle: Whether you're a company, trainer, talent or investor, there's a place for you in the EduPro adventure.

contactInfo.title: Contact us
contactInfo.subtitle: Have a question? A training project? Our team is here to help you.
